content: अवरोधः {@--1@} Hindrance, obstruction; फेनायमानं स्रोतोऽवरोधः <ls>Suśr.</ls> {@--2@} Restraint; अंतःप्राणावरोध <ls>Mk. 1. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Inner apartments or women's apartments, harem, seraglio; निन्ये विनीतैरवरोधदक्षैः <ls>Ku. 7. 73</ls>; <ls>Śi. 5. 7</ls>; अवरोधजनः <ls>K. 57</ls>; °गृहेषु राज्ञः <ls>Ś. 5. 3</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">6. 11.</ls> {@--4@} The wives of a king taken collectively (<ab>oft.</ab> <ab>pl.</ab>); अवरोधे महत्यपि <ls>R. 1. 32</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 68</ls>, <ls n="R. 4.">87</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 48</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 58</ls>, <ls>Mv. 6. 20.</ls> {@--5@} An enclosure, confinement. {@--6@} Siege, investment, blockade; दुर्गावरोधः <ls>H. 3.</ls> {@--7@} A covering, lid. {@--8@} A fence, a pen. {@--9@} A watchman. {@--10@} Depression, hollow. {@--11@} Layer (plant); see under अवरुह्.
अवरोधः {@--1@} Moving down, descending. {@--2@} A shoot sent up by the root of a plant; a slip (for planting); the pendent shoots of the (Indian) fig-tree.
